  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50

      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18

            text run at (0,0) width 44: "Hover "

              text run at (43,0) width 32: "here"
          LayoutText {#text} at (74,0) size 152x18
            text run at (74,0) width 152: " and the background of "

              text run at (225,0) width 159: "this text should go green"
          LayoutText {#text} at (383,0) size 5x18
